title: As of now who is more popular in India, Narendra Modi or Mahatma Gandhi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Narendra Modi is more relevant and popular leader . In Quora Mahatma Gnadhi has 59.9k followers while Narendra Modi has 601.9K followers.Mahathma Gandhi has been reduced to the role of logo for Swatch Bharath while Modiji is the one portrayed the true Patriot.Even Gandhigram in their new calendar displaced Mahatha for the first time. It is replaced by Modiji, this shows the trend.So Narendra Modi undoubtedly is more popular.

Q : As of now who is more popular in India, Narendra Modi or Mahatma Gandhi? A : I think the comparison is wrong because NaMo is in action and has many years to go whereas Indians have treat M K Gandhi a demigod. Who is more relevant today? Undoubtedly it is NaMo. Who is more popular today? Fortunately or unfortunately it is still M K Gandhi.

Mahatama Gandhi stood for non violence and peace . Modi is opposite. Modi believe in tit for tat. However he also has a soft side but he is different breed . Modi is aggressive leader. Mahtama Gandhi was like a old hindi singer. Mahtama Modi is like rock singer .
